value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    USERS {
        uuid id PK
        text email
        text password_hash
        text company_name
        text department
        text position
        timestamp created_at
        timestamp updated_at
    }
    DIAGNOSTIC_SESSIONS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        timestamp start_time
        timestamp end_time
        text status
    }
    QUESTIONS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid session_id FK
        text content
        integer order
        timestamp created_at
    }
    ANSWERS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid question_id FK
        text content
        timestamp created_at
    }
    DIAGNOSTIC_RESULTS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid session_id FK
        jsonb score
        text analysis
        timestamp created_at
    }
    IMPROVEMENT_PROPOSALS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid result_id FK
        text content
        integer priority
        timestamp created_at
    }
    IMPROVEMENT_PLANS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        uuid proposal_id FK
        text description
        date target_date
        text status
        timestamp created_at
        timestamp updated_at
    }
    REPORTS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid session_id FK
        jsonb content
        timestamp created_at
    }
    SUPPORT_TICKETS {
        uuid id PK
        uuid user_id FK
        text subject
        text description
        text status
        timestamp created_at
        timestamp updated_at
    }
    USERS ||--o{ DIAGNOSTIC_SESSIONS : "ユーザーが診断を実施"
    DIAGNOSTIC_SESSIONS ||--o{ QUESTIONS : "セッションに質問が含まれる"
    QUESTIONS ||--o{ ANSWERS : "質問に対する回答"
    DIAGNOSTIC_SESSIONS ||--|| DIAGNOSTIC_RESULTS : "セッションの診断結果"
    DIAGNOSTIC_RESULTS ||--o{ IMPROVEMENT_PROPOSALS : "診断結果に基づく改善提案"
    IMPROVEMENT_PROPOSALS ||--o{ IMPROVEMENT_PLANS : "提案に基づく改善計画"
    USERS ||--o{ IMPROVEMENT_PLANS : "ユーザーが改善計画を作成"
    DIAGNOSTIC_SESSIONS ||--|| REPORTS : "セッションのレポート"
    USERS ||--o{ SUPPORT_TICKETS : "ユーザーがサポートチケットを作成"
